course.subject: LIFS
course.name: Biomedical Sciences Research Project I
course.description: A research project conducted either in the Division of Life Science or the Chemistry department under the supervision of a faculty member. This course is for MBMS students only. Students are expected to also register for LIFS 4982. Approval of the course instructor is needed for students to enroll in this course.
course.exclusions: LIFS 4971, LIFS 4970, CHEM 4680
